heading: Node.js Project 2: Small Project on Templates
target: Utilize EJS or JADE template engine with Express.js
Parse JSON files using EJS templates
tasks: Create an app which will send search query and fetch JSON data from an API of your choice. Use these lists for a reference: AnyAPI or Public-APIS.io.
If AJAX creates problems, you can read the data from a local file.
Apply EJS/Jade templates to display the data.
Use Pure.css or Bootstrap to style the pages
Deploy to Heroku. Return code to GitHub.
